title: Currency Range
content: The world Currency dashboard share information about world currency. Includes collect currency value from the api and filtering data. This is organized and shared in a presentable view through dashboard
para: The Currency dashboard is designed to provide users with real-time exchange rates and fluctuations for global currencies. It help in stay informed about currency values and market trends. Converter that allows users to calculate values between different currencies quickly.
footerpara: Source code and more Documentation below
brief: world currency value details and graph

title: Inventory Dashboard
para: The Inventory Management dashboard is a powerful tool designed to help businesses efficiently track, manage, and optimize their inventory. It streamlines inventory processes, reduces errors, and enhances visibility across the supply chain.
footerpara: Source code and more Documentation below
brief: A Sales and Analytics dashboard show the clothing based details

title: Weather View
para: The Weather App is a user-friendly application that provides real-time weather updates, forecasts. It caters to individuals and businesses looking to stay informed about weather conditions, helping them plan their activities accordingly.
footerpara: Source code and more Documentation below
brief: Weather application with details of temperature,humidity, and location

title: BankDash
para: Bank dash is a dashboard UI, shows details about the credit cards and transactions.
